Created attachment 559403
Sample XUL file showing the problem

Tested with:
  xulrunner-6.0.en-US.linux-x86_64
  xulrunner-7.0b4.en-US.linux-x86_64
  custom debug verion of xulrunner 6.0
on:
  Ubuntu 10.10 (with Gnome)

Steps to reproduce this bug (using attached sample xul file):
1. Move the application window away from left screen egde
2. Click on "Open panel" button
3. Move the window towards left screen edge until the panel overlaps the window.

The application is in an infinite loop (one of the processor cores is used up to 100%).

Expected behavior:
The panel either goes off-screen or prevents the window from moving left when it reaches left screen edge.

The attached screen-shots picture the problem. They contain part of the log file showing the looping event.
